description: A generic format for an RTMS event.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HPEOC-RTMS-MIB::rtmsMessage HPEOC-RTMS-MIB::trapSSID s EXAMPLE HPEOC-RTMS-MIB::trapEventNumber s EXAMPL HPEOC-RTMS-MIB::trapSeverity s EXAMPLE HPEOC-RTMS-MIB::trapProcess s EXAMPLE HPEOC-RTMS-MIB::trapGenerationtime s EXAMPLEEXAMPLEEXAMP HPEOC-RTMS-MIB::trapText s EXAMPLE

description: subsystem ID that generated the event
variables.name: HPEOC-RTMS-MIB::trapSSID

description: The process name that generated the event
variables.name: HPEOC-RTMS-MIB::trapProcess

description: GMT the event was generated, rendered
yyyy-mm-dd hh.mm.ss. Timestamp is system time
variables.name: HPEOC-RTMS-MIB::trapGenerationtime

description: The text expansion of the RTMS event
variables.name: HPEOC-RTMS-MIB::trapText
